job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Back End Developer- AI Trainer (Dutch)

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to improve their coding capabilities through human feedback, rather than developing, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models. The core tasks involve crafting questions and evaluating AI-generated code, which aligns more with using AI tools for productivity enhancement rather than core AI engineering. There is no mention of core AI engineering tasks like model training, data engineering, or MLOps.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'train AI models' and 'help train generative artificial intelligence models', which directly relates to the process of developing or adapting AI models.
The phrase 'Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models' describes a specific method of contributing to the training process of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models

job_tasks.justification: The task of 'Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models' is a form of model evaluation and feedback, which is part of the iterative process of improving AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

job_tasks.justification: The job title 'Back End Developer' and the description 'experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise' suggest involvement in software development, though the primary focus is on training AI.
The phrase 'help cutting-edge generative AI models write better code' implies an application of software engineering principles to improve AI output.
job_tasks.phrase: help cutting-edge generative AI models write better code

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
